Name: Azimech
About the game: Two forest entities join forces to fight evil. They will have to fight against waves of enemies to bring down the main forest entities. Cooperation will be essential to their success, doubting the goal will not be allowed... Be part of the action, fight intensely with your friend, to defeat the evil creatures of the forest. Merge into a single entity with your ally to become stronger and to eradicate the threat that's facing you. Your powers will allow you to defeat the enemy waves and to reach the ultimate elite of the forest. Be careful ! Sometimes, keeping separate could be the best choice. Game features : - a top-view shooter - a two players local cooperative game - an intense adventure with your friend - 4 levels to surpass - a powerful fusion to drive together - huge fights against waves of ennemis - dynamic battles against bosses
